prospects.name: Letta
prospects.description: Commercializing UC Berkeley's MemGPT research to build stateful memory systems for AI agents, enabling long-term contextual retention and personalized interactions
prospects.target_customers: Developers building AI agents, enterprise AI teams
prospects.pain_points: Stateless LLMs requiring repetitive context, limited context windows, lack of personalized AI experiences
prospects.growth_signals: Recent $10M seed round, viral open-source traction (11k+ GitHub stars), emerging from stealth
prospects.technology_stack: MemGPT architecture, Python, Docker, cloud infrastructure

key_contacts.name: Charles Packer
key_contacts.title: Co-founder & CEO
key_contacts.background: PhD UC Berkeley, MemGPT researcher, RL/LLM expert
key_contacts.recent_activity: Launched Letta commercial platform, MemGPT open-source maintenance

key_contacts.name: Sarah Wooders
key_contacts.title: Co-founder & CTO
key_contacts.background: PhD UC Berkeley, AI systems researcher, MemGPT co-creator
key_contacts.recent_activity: Technical leadership for Letta Cloud launch

opportunity_assessment.why_good_fit: Directly solving unlimited memory for LLMs using MemGPT architecture, exactly matches 'long-term memory for AI' focus

outreach_strategy.key_messaging: Memory management integration, stateful API advantages
outreach_strategy.conversation_starters: Reference MemGPT research paper/showcase use cases

prospects.name: Mem0
prospects.description: Building universal memory layer for LLM applications enabling persistent memory, personalized experiences, and continuous learning from interactions
prospects.target_customers: AI developers, enterprises with AI chatbots
prospects.pain_points: Stateless AI interactions, repetitive context re-entry, lack of personalization
prospects.growth_signals: 50k+ developer users, SOC 2/HIPAA compliance, YC S24 graduate

key_contacts.name: Taranjeet Singh
key_contacts.title: Co-founder & CEO
key_contacts.background: Serial AI entrepreneur (Embedchain creator), YC alum

key_contacts.name: Deshraj Yadav
key_contacts.title: Co-founder & CTO
key_contacts.background: Ex-Tesla Autopilot engineer, Georgia Tech ML researcher

opportunity_assessment.why_good_fit: Self-improving memory layer for unlimited context retention, focus on persistent personalization

outreach_strategy.key_messaging: Cost reduction via memory compression, personalization capabilities
outreach_strategy.conversation_starters: Reference open-source traction or YC affiliation
